manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EZ BLADE Shave Gel EZ Blade Shave Gel Shave Oil BasedWaterless ShaveAllows The Blade To Glide Across the SkinClear Non Foam GelOpens Pores, Relaxes the Face Softens Beard Hairs About The EZ Blade Shave Gel has been around since 2010 and there’s a reason why our customers won’t use any other product- it provides one of the best shaves you can get! We tailor our products to suit the high quality needs of barbers around the world while also making them accessible for the everyday shaver. This means that you can get a professional feeling shave in the comfort of your own home! We use only the highest quality ingredients and natural scents that leave your skin feeling and looking healthy, smooth, and refreshed. And just like a trip to your favorite barber, you can expect longer lasting results from our products than traditional shaving creams. And as an added bonus, no harsh chemical smells! We use natural ingredients that leave behind a subtle scent that our clients love.

Why Is Our Shave Gel Different What separates our shave gel from others is that we use pre-shave oil as the base. This means extra hydration for your skin, excellent razor protection, and a cleaner, better shaving experience. It also means that you can use the razor of your choice when shaving whether that’s a single or multi-blade. And because we use a shave oil base, your skin won’t be nearly as dry or stripped after shaving. Instead, it’ll feel smooth and hydrated. Directions for use Start by applying a small amount of shaving gel to your fingertips. Rub the product in a circular motion so that it lifts the hair in the area in need of a shave. This can be done with your fingers or a shave brush. Use your favorite razor for a high quality shave. You also don’t need to use water with our shaving gel unless you want to. Our gel lathers perfectly on its own. For best results, use with our EZ Blade Double Edged Razors and EZ Blade Badger Brush. Follow up with our EZ Blade Aftershave Tonic or Lotion for silky, hydrated skin. Features Shave oil based for a more comfortable shaving experienceNo water required- simply apply and shaveOur formula allows the blade to glide effortlessly across the skinClear non foam gel means you can see every hairOur gel opens pores, relaxes the skin and softens even the coarsest beard hairs

What Kind Of Razor Can I Use? The EZ Blade Shaving Gel can be used with the razor of your choice, including straight razors, safety razors, single blades and multi blades. Only a small amount of our shave gel is needed this means our bottles last longer! Give yourself or your customers a premium shave with this hydrating, protecting gel.

Our Story EZ-BLADE shaving products have been around since 2010. We started off in the barber industry where we sold our most popular product to date: The EZ Blade Shaving Gel. However, we wanted to bring the same level of shaving experience that you get from a professional barber to the average shaver. This led us to start creating and selling our products to everyone. We knew what we exacted as barbers and professionals in the industry so we knew what our customer base would also want out of their shaving experience.

The EZ Blade Products Mission The EZ Blade Products Mission Headquartered in New York City, EZ Blade is dedicated to serving the shaving needs of men around the world. We have devoted ourselves to creating only the highest quality of products because we believe that every man deserves the best shave of his life. We have made it our mission to continue designing and developing new products that not only meet your shaving needs, but exceed them. All of our products are American made! In every products we put our special ingredient LOVE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smoothest shave ever
reviews.reviewText: I initially purchased this gel to use for my cheeks and my neck area so that I could see exactly what I was shaving so I wouldn't keep shaving hairs off my beard. I was using a regular shaving cream which made it difficult to see what I was doing and would result in my beard slowly dwindling away after each shave.I decided on this particular product because of the reviews and because it was available for same say shipping. As soon as I received it, I tried it out and was amazed out how smooth my face was. Despite the dull blade, my shave was smoother than with any other product I have ever used and I had no irritation afterward.I later decided to try to see how it did shaving my head. At first it seemed a little odd as it goes on clear and just a thin layer is all that is needed making it feel like there was nothing there. After the first pass, I knew that the new badger brush I bought and had only used once would now reside in the drawer along with a nearly unused tube of Italian shaving cream.The gel looks like green slime in the container but when applied to the skin is completely clear and has a nice, clean lime scent. Although it has a shaving oil in it, it is not greasy at all and washes off my razor easily. Another benefit is that no water or anything else is required making the process faster and less messy. It also does not leave a residue in my sink like the Italian stuff did.Needless to say, I am extremely happy I found this stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use a Damascus steel straight razor and this, by far, has been the best product to use, along with a sharp blade. Smooth as a baby's heiny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slick and Smooth
reviews.reviewText: This stuff had to be made by the shaving gods!First, let me tell you that i tried each and every method possible for a smooth shave. I started with the regular shaving cream. Broke me out BADLY! Then I switched to the aveeno. I mean it's natural right? BROKE ME OUT BADLY! Then I said, I'll just use clippers. Well that didn't work well either. Just bad hair bumps (One my prone African American skin). So I switched to a shavette and a Shea Moisture cream like product. Smelled good, decent results, but goopy and inconsistent feel. Which led me to this.While searching for a oil based product, I learned about clear gel shaving. After cross shopping with other brands, I decided on EZ-Blade. I absolutely love this product. The clear application. The soothing facial feel. The glide... I made shaving feel like I was buttering toast. Effortless. And the price wasn't that badMy only gripe i have is that it dries super fast, so I have to reapply to certain areas that I have to be more precise on. But that isn't a big deal, I mean the jar is a great size.Overall, I think I have found my lifetime shaving companion. It leaves my skin smooth as baby's bottom (cliche I know, but so true). I would recommend this to everyone I know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use it for when I shave

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Waterless, but Provide a Perfect Shave
reviews.reviewText: I like this product much more than I expected. I am a long-time KOS customer, so I pref foamless shaving. I was amazed at how smooth the shave was and how close. You need this product on hand in case you’re ever without water. Or, even if you aren’t.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like the cream but you have to apply a LOT ...
reviews.reviewText: mine arrived with lid cracked , in an envelope (not a box). This mint green gel cream should be sold in a tube.I like the cream but you have to apply a LOT of it to get a good shave. I anticipate going through this jar easily within one month and again it has no lid.. the product is as advertised but there are two issues: 1) you must really apply a lot of this gel and shave quickly before it dries 2) it doesn’t remove easily. I have to use water to remove . The irony is I use water to remove a waterless shave cream, which defeats the purpose. I’d buy this again because I can shave my head outdoors or quickly in a public restroom (if my jar had a lid!).. but you really have to over-apply this, and then to remove its residue (perhaps because I over apply), I need water . The only way I can make this work without irritation is to apply massive amounts . I’d buy it again , though, and that’s the bottom like. It’s just I’ll have to buy more frequently than soap or cream. I shave my face with cream. I shave my head with EZ. I like the scent.,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shave gel is awesome ! And the best part , you get to use all of it till the very end

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We loved it
reviews.reviewText: I got a whim to shave my husband beard with a straight razor. He has never done this nor I. I bought this only because amazon suggested it with my purchase of a straight razor. I loved it and so did my husband. It was so easy to use. The shave was smooth he never got an irritation from it, and his skin was baby soft afterwards. I even used it with out shortening the shaving area furst. I loved that i could see what i was shaving as well so i didnt shave his beard any. I used it as the product suggested. Maybe a smidge more then recommended. . I even enjoyed shaving his face. I will have to do it regularly now.

reviews.reviewTitle: Never going back to shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: Been using this for this for almost 2 years now. Paired with straight edge razor 'm now getting smooth precise edges with my beard. I am completely satisfied with this gel. Never going back regular shaving cream.

Ottimo gel per le rifiniture, sia per la trasparenza sia per il miglioramento della performance meccanica del rasoio. Personalmente però non reputo, forse per un mio limite, che sia in grado di sostituire, se non eccezionalmente, una buona crema tradizionale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is absolutely amazing!!! No pre shave creams or oils needed either. It is a gel and oil mix which doesn’t clog up my razor . Face feels automatically moisturised and fresh after your shave due to the oil ingredients. No razor burn either. Only a small amount needed for your shave also which means the pot it comes in will last a very long time . Can’t rate this stuff highly enough 10/10 buy it you won’t regret it !!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: What can I say, it’s an excellent product.Easy to apply and super smooth, cutting like hot knife through butter. Lovely smell and not too over powering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 2, 2021
reviews.reviewText: First time I tried is nice smell nice and Custumers love it I would perfer if have a pump but is really good
